items.name: case disconnecting
items.desc: The VPN is in the process of disconnecting.

items.name: case reasserting
items.desc: The VPN is in the process of reconnecting.

items.name: case connecting
items.desc: The VPN is in the process of connecting.

items.name: case invalid
items.desc: The associated VPN configuration does not exist in the Network Extension preferences or is not enabled.
